Text:
Label: Unexploded records

While the members noted here were correct before, except you've forgotten guitarist Adam nilsson,
this album was recorded with the following musicians:

Dan Heikenberg: Guitars, vocals, keyboards, Violin, mouth harp, flute, lyrics, music

Robin fors: Bass on a few tracks
Adam Nilsson: Guitar on a few tracks and bass on a few
Mathias Klauser: Drums


If you like the album, don't be afraid to go out and buy it :)
